name: DepotCreated
description: Event triggered when a new depot is created.

properties.name: depotId
properties.description: The unique identifier of the created depot.

properties.name: externalRef
properties.description: The external reference of the created depot.

properties.name: location
properties.description: The physical location of the created depot.

properties.name: status
properties.description: The status of the created depot.
